meanings.definition: Attractive or stylish in a flashy way.
meanings.sent1: The car with the snazziest paint job won the competition.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the snazziest outfits to parties.
meanings.sent3: The snazziest hat at the event had flashing lights on it.
meanings.sent4: His snazziest dance move was a twirl followed by a jump.
meanings.sent5: The snazziest sunglasses she owned were covered in glitter.

meanings.sent1: She was known as the snazziest dresser in town.
meanings.sent2: The snazziest of all the dresses was the one with sequins.
meanings.sent3: The snazziest of the hats looked like a crown made of flowers.
meanings.sent4: His snazziest accessory was a pocket square in a bold color.
meanings.sent5: The snazziest of the shoes had sparkling gems on them.
